class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.table.ParentMenu
class.comment: Information about dynamic parent menus used in the LIMS application

column.name: OCX_LOAD_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to OCX load information

column.name: NUMBER_IN_SEQUENCE
column.comment: Used for ordering each menu item

column.name: CAPTION
column.comment: Text of the menu item to appear in the menu

column.name: OCX_NAME
column.comment: Name of the external Active-X control that will be loaded when the menu is selected.

column.name: URL_NAME
column.comment: Name of URL used when menu is selected

column.name: SCREEN_NAME
column.comment: Name of screen displayed when menu is selected

column.name: PARENT_MENU_ID
column.comment: Name of the parent menu that this menu item will appear. Values can be File, Lab Setup, Study Setup, Sample, Container, Results, or Tools.
